H0.text: Flowing water is the energy source that will run out the fastest as Sydney learns about sources of energy that can run out.

H1.text: Natural gas is the energy source that will run out the fastest according to Sydneyâ€™s learning about sources of energy that can run out.

H2.text: Sunlight is the energy source that will run out the fastest for Sydney, who is learning about sources of energy that can run out.

H3.text: Wind is the energy source that will run out the fastest as Sydney learns about sources of energy that can run out.

A4.text: Natural resources such as coal, petroleum (crude oil) and natural gas take thousands of years to form naturally and cannot be replaced as fast as they are being consumed.
